title: mordkasier might be broken next patch
body: new liandrys and most importanly the new baron elder buffs , mord can solo baron with his ult and get it in like 8 sec ,he also pushes hard and able to build banner of command , looks like champs who can solo baron will be so broken next patch

replies.body:
Last I remember, you cant Ult anything that is not a champion as it does not give a ghost.  Also think you mean elder dragon, not baron.

The banner change is a nice buff however and I cant wait to try it out for myself.
You can ult dragons as morde lol

> [{quoted}](name=Selegun,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kGuXnir7,comment-id=0000000000010000,timestamp=2018-02-16T17:01:13.017+0000)
>
> Now now, you can't fault him too much for not knowing.  Lots of little things like that can slip past without people picking up on them.

I can't fault him for it. Riot forgot what Mordes ultimate does. I'm just trying to point out talking from a place of ignorance isn't anyplace to start a discussion

You can mark a dragon as long as you have a point in your Ult.  Its a bit different in the fact that you gain no benefit and deal no damage with the mark unless it's on a champion.  When dragon is marked your team is required to kill it for the mark to gain any value.

We'll see how it goes. Mordekaiser is currently very weak - weakest he has been ever since I started playing him back in 2012 - so I doubt he will suddenly become broken. 
Hopefully his winrate will go up a bit, maybe even above that 50% he hasn't reached in a long time, but it won't be anything on par with, for example, current Gangplank, who has been the top toplaner for quite a few patches now.

What would you do. 
Dwindling 1% playrate champion 
Gets a indirect buff. that helps change the feeling of uselessness his  Mains have  during the lategame. 

Let it fly.   He's only going to affect about 1% off all games
